name: TerminAItor
description:
You controll a character. You are in central park (pls don't sue me). You commited the crime of genocide. Your goal is to leave no witnesses. If you gain 3 strikes the police catches you. Let's say your Killer robot friend idly walks into a civillians line of sight, one strike. Maybe you walk into a civillians line of sight, one strike. Or you just run out of ammo, your gun turns into a siren and you gain 3 instant strikes (the cops get you).

Watch out.. your gun alerts nearby civillians when you use it. You will have to plan your shots wisely!

W A S D or ARROW KEYS to move

SPACE to fire
